release.action: XHTML serializers was moved to the org.wikimodel.wem.xhtml package

links like: {{{ [[link]] [[link|linkText}} }}} aren't working properly
The "," symbol was excluded from the in-line URI patterns. Details: http://code.google.com/p/wikimodel/issues/detail?id=10
In WIkiCreole parser: The nowiki markup strings of "{{{" and "}}}" should not show up in the rendered HTML. Details http://code.google.com/p/wikimodel/issues/detail?id=11
## for a nested ordered list item is incorrectly interpreted as monospace which currently isn't even in the Creole 1.0 spec. Details: http://code.google.com/p/wikimodel/issues/detail?id=9
A new Eclipse launch configuration was added - it is used to re-build individual grammar file.
